title: Elneny and Zinchenko play Guess The Gooner !
body_text:
Reckon you know a true Gooner? See if you can spot the imposter in the latest episode of Guess the Gooner with Mohamed Elneny and Oleksandr Zinchenko!
Five supporters were in the identity parade for the duo plus Sharky and Frimmy to figure out who wasnâ€™t an actual Arsenal fan.
Press play on the video above to enjoy the drama!
You can also see how Emile Smith Rowe and Eddie Nketiah got on in our first edition during our US tour, as well as Bukayo Saka and Kai Havertz earlier this season.
